job.title: AWS Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: This Jobot Job is hosted by Kyle Shaw  Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button and sending us your resume.  Salary $135,000 - $200,000 per year We are a tech unicorn building a digital experience platform that leverages tons of data to provide global businesses and brands insights to best build hyper-personalized customer experiences when engaging with their digital platforms and sites. We work with some of the biggest brands in the world across industries.  We've been growing rapidly and are looking to significantly expand our infrastructure team by hiring several Site Reliability Engineers. We provide a lucrative compensation package with competitive pay, great medical and dental benefits, Flex PTO, and 401k + matching. As a fully-remote team, we embrace work flexibility and work / life balance. Our culture matters most to us, and we value collaboration, no ego's, and team-players who enjoy working with their colleagues.  We have a unique and diverse team make up and hire with a tech-agnostic approach, allowing us to hire some of the sharpest minds in the industry, regardless of technical or development language experience. As a AWS Site Reliability Engineer, you'll be responsible for rebuilding and refining our cloud infrastructure from the ground up to better automate, scale, and improve the stability and security of our cloud environment. We are seeking a SRE with strong cloud experience that loves automation and has worked in cloud environments holding significant amounts of data.  Our infrastructure is predominantly hosted in AWS along with a bit of GCP, and we are in the midst of containerizing our environment with Kubernetes. Plusses Interested in hearing more?
